languages.text: Лорд-капитан бросает взгляд вглубь темного коридора, словно приходя к некому осознанию — и поворачивает назад. Долгий поход на нижние палубы обернулся ловушкой, подстроенной обезумевшей системой, и бесполезной тратой драгоценного времени.

The Lord Captain glances down the dark passageway, seemingly coming to some realisation — and turns back. The long journey to the lower decks has turned out to be a trap set by a system that has gone haywire, and a pointless waste of precious time.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан бросает взгляд вглубь темного коридора, словно приходя к некому осознанию — и поворачивает назад. Долгий поход на нижние палубы обернулся ловушкой, подстроенной обезумевшей системой, и бесполезной тратой драгоценного времени.

The Lord Captain glances down the dark passageway, seemingly coming to some realisation — and turns back. The long journey to the lower decks has turned out to be a trap set by a system that has gone haywire, and a pointless waste of precious time.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} mira el pasadizo oscuro y, como si hubiera pensado en algo, da media vuelta. El largo viaje a las cubiertas inferiores ha resultado ser una trampa tendida por un sistema descontrolado y una pérdida de un tiempo muy valioso.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain glances down the dark passageway, seemingly coming to some realisation — and turns back. The long journey to the lower decks has turned out to be a trap set by a system that has gone haywire, and a pointless waste of precious time.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} mira el pasadizo oscuro y, como si hubiera pensado en algo, da media vuelta. El largo viaje a las cubiertas inferiores ha resultado ser una trampa tendida por un sistema descontrolado y una pérdida de un tiempo muy valioso.

languages.text: 领主舰长瞥了一眼黑暗的通道，似乎意识到了什么，之后转身回去了。原来，前往下层甲板的漫长旅程只不过是失去控制的系统设下的陷阱，而且浪费了领主舰长的宝贵时间。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain glances down the dark passageway, seemingly coming to some realisation — and turns back. The long journey to the lower decks has turned out to be a trap set by a system that has gone haywire, and a pointless waste of precious time.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长瞥了一眼黑暗的通道，似乎意识到了什么，之后转身回去了。原来，前往下层甲板的漫长旅程只不过是失去控制的系统设下的陷阱，而且浪费了领主舰长的宝贵时间。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは暗い通路を眺め、何かを悟ったように振り返る。下層デッキへの長い道のりは狂ったシステムに仕掛けられた罠で、貴重な時間を無意味に使ってしまったのだと理解した。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain glances down the dark passageway, seemingly coming to some realisation — and turns back. The long journey to the lower decks has turned out to be a trap set by a system that has gone haywire, and a pointless waste of precious time.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは暗い通路を眺め、何かを悟ったように振り返る。下層デッキへの長い道のりは狂ったシステムに仕掛けられた罠で、貴重な時間を無意味に使ってしまったのだと理解した。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain blickt den dunklen Gang hinunter, scheint zu einer Erkenntnis zu gelangen ... und kehrt um. Die lange Reise zu den unteren Decks hat sich als Falle eines ausgefallenen Systems … und als sinnlose Vergeudung kostbarer Zeit erwiesen.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain glances down the dark passageway, seemingly coming to some realisation — and turns back. The long journey to the lower decks has turned out to be a trap set by a system that has gone haywire, and a pointless waste of precious time.

languages.text: Il suffit {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} d'un coup d'œil dans le passage sombre pour comprendre qu'{mf|il|elle} doit faire demi-tour. Il se trouve que le long trajet jusqu'aux ponts inférieurs était un piège tendu par un système détraqué. Un temps précieux a été perdu.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain glances down the dark passageway, seemingly coming to some realisation — and turns back. The long journey to the lower decks has turned out to be a trap set by a system that has gone haywire, and a pointless waste of precious time.

traits.locale_text: Il suffit {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} d'un coup d'œil dans le passage sombre pour comprendre qu'{mf|il|elle} doit faire demi-tour. Il se trouve que le long trajet jusqu'aux ponts inférieurs était un piège tendu par un système détraqué. Un temps précieux a été perdu.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, karanlık geçitten aşağı bakıp sonrasında kafasında bir şeyleri oturtmuşçasına geri dönüyor. Alt güvertelere yapılan uzun yolculuk, kafayı sıyırmış bir sistem tarafından kurulmuş, değerli zamanın israf olmasına neden olan bir tuzakmış.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain glances down the dark passageway, seemingly coming to some realisation — and turns back. The long journey to the lower decks has turned out to be a trap set by a system that has gone haywire, and a pointless waste of precious time.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan; karanlık geçitten aşağı bakıyor, belli ki kafasında bir şeyler oturuyor ve geri dönüyor. Alt güvertelere yapılan uzun yolculuğun, kafayı sıyırmış bir sistem tarafından kurulmuş bir tuzak olduğu ve değerli zamanını yok yere israf ettiği ortaya çıktı.
